name: C. Clock Conversion
statement:
Given the time in 24-hour format, output the equivalent time in 12-hour
format. 24-hour format divides the day into 24 hours from 00 to 23, each
of which has 60 minutes from 00 to 59. 12-hour format divides the day
into two halves: the first half is
mathrm{AM}, and the second half is
mathrm{PM}. In each half, the hours are numbered in the order 12, 01,
02, 03,
dots, 11. Each hour has 60 minutes numbered from 00 to 59.
